title: Biden's European trip will be heavy on displays of Western unity but could be light on actions to stop Putin's Ukraine war - CNN
content:
1. Biden's European trip will be heavy on displays of Western unity but could be light on actions to stop Putin's Ukraine war  CNN
  2. US ambassador ‘can’t imagine’ Biden will visit Ukraine during Europe trip: ‘This is a country at war’  Fox News
  3. Biden set to travel to Belgium to meet with NATO and European leaders  CBS Evening News
  4. Biden will visit Poland following NATO summit on Russia's invasion of Ukraine  CNN
  5. White House to Meet With Exxon, Other Firms on Russia Sanctions  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: President Joe Biden and his fellow world leaders hope to finalize and unveil a package of new measures to punish Russia, help Ukraine and demonstrate Western unity at a string of emergency summits in Europe this week.
